dashboard.verificationMessage: You need to verify your account before you can create or manage courses. Please complete the verification process in Settings to unlock this feature.
dashboard.whyVerifyMessage: Account verification ensures the security and authenticity of your institution, allowing you to access all platform features.

aboutUs.heroDescription: Empowering education through technology. Connecting institutions, students, and lecturers across Iraq.
aboutUs.missionDescription: Project East is dedicated to revolutionizing the educational landscape in Iraq by providing a comprehensive platform that bridges the gap between educational institutions, students, and lecturers. We believe in making quality education accessible to everyone through innovative technology solutions.
aboutUs.educationalExcellenceDesc: Connecting students, lecturers, and institutions in one comprehensive platform.
aboutUs.communityDrivenDesc: Building a vibrant community of learners and educators across Iraq.
aboutUs.innovationFirstDesc: Leveraging cutting-edge technology to transform education.
aboutUs.modernTechnologyDesc: Built with React, Node.js, and modern web standards.
aboutUs.mohammedBio: Passionate about creating innovative solutions and building scalable applications. Specialized in modern web technologies and cloud architecture.
aboutUs.mustafaBio: Dedicated to crafting exceptional user experiences and robust backend systems. Expert in database design and API development.
aboutUs.noorBio: CS Bachelor, Technical Diploma, 6 years of study. Responsible for creating comprehensive documentation and ensuring clear communication of project features and functionality.
